lead_paragraph: The decision came five days after the state attorney general said Gov. Nathan Deal did not have the authority to stop the resettlement of Syrian refugees.

headline.print_headline: Georgia: Governor Lifts Block Against Syrian Refugees
headline.main: Georgia: Governor Lifts Block Against Syrian Refugees

snippet: The decision came five days after the state attorney general said Gov. Nathan Deal did not have the authority to stop the resettlement of Syrian refugees.
abstract: Gov Nathan Deal of Georgia lifts executive order prohibiting resettlement of Syrian refugees; one-sentence order comes five days after Atty Gen Sam Olens declared Deal did not have that authority.
